p: This study is the first to report A. albopictus infected by DENV and ZIKV during an outbreak of a dengue-like illness in a rural area in Brazil. In Brazil, A. aegypti was previously the only species proven to be involved in the transmission of these viruses, considered typical of urban settings. Despite a tendency of expansion of DENV to the countryside, all the explanations for this phenomenon remain on the establishment of A. aegypti in smaller cities [ 39].
